## PriorityTaskQueue class

The same as [PriorityQueue](./promizr.priorityqueue.md) but items are the tasks to execute.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class PriorityTaskQueue<T> extends PriorityQueue<AsyncTask<T>, T> 
```
